test.description: This models represents a test of some sort for which we are managing traffic. Each test will have 1 or more variants to enable things like test/control.

fields.name: key
fields.description: A unique, randomly generated string that can be used as a seed into the hashing functions

fields.name: name
fields.description: A human readable name for this test

fields.name: variants
fields.description: The current (at time of request) set of live variants. Look at the allocation model if you would like to find out exactly when each set of variants went live.

allocation.description: Each variant represents a percentage of traffic that is allocated randomly for a given test. The sum of the variants will always equal 100 percent

fields.name: test
fields.description: The test to which this allocation belongs

fields.name: start
fields.description: When this allocation of traffic went live

fields.name: end
fields.description: When this allocation of traffic was ended. The most common use case for ending an allocation of traffic is, for example, during an incremetal rollout when traffic patterns are changed. We record each allocation (copy on edit) to enable reporting.

test_variant.description: An individual test variant, mapping a name to a percentage of traffic

fields.name: name
fields.description: A human readable name for this variant. The name must be unique within the context of a given test allocation. Uniqueness is case insensitive.

variant.description: Represents a fully hydrated specific test variant. This model will be used in almost all requests for live traffic and thus includes references to other objects to minimize size.

fields.name: test
fields.description: The test to which this specific variant belongs

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the specific variant

reference.description: Wrapper for guids, allowing API to reference another model without including ALL of the details of the referenced model

fields.name: code
fields.description: Machine readable code for this specific error message

operations.description: Fetch a specific test by guid
Returns a paginated list of all of the tests

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: Filter to tests matching this guid

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter to tests matching this name - case insensitive, partial match

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to paginate. First page of results has offset 0.

operations.description: Returns a paginated list of all of the variants

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter to variants that are live for this specific id. Typically the id will be a user id or a session id

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Filter to variants that are live at this particular moment in time. Defaults to now

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to paginate. First page of results has offset 0.
